body: Hello! I recently bought a new account called "MechanicalYoshi" and I was hoping that you can transfer my gold donor to it. If you need the transition ID ill provide it.
body_tagged: Hello! I recently bought a new account called "MechanicalYoshi" and I was hoping that you can transfer my gold donor to it. If you need the transition ID ill provide it.
title: Donation Help.

replies.body:
I'd recommend sending a Skype message to a Sr Mod+ or emailing support@avicus.net explaining the situation.

It won't take long for a reply :D
replies.body_tagged:
I'd recommend sending a Skype message to a Sr Mod+ or emailing support@avicus.net explaining the situation.

It won't take long for a reply :D

replies.body:
Please contact Sr.Mods+ via Skype or E-Mail Support@Avicus.net.

Thank You.
replies.body_tagged:
Please contact Sr.Mods+ via Skype or E-Mail Support@Avicus.net.

Thank You.

replies.body: Keep trying, but if they do not respond, try messaging others via Skype, or re-send an e-mail to support@avicus.net with the transaction ID along with your request.
replies.body_tagged: Keep trying, but if they do not respond, try messaging others via Skype, or re-send an e-mail to support@avicus.net with the transaction ID along with your request.
